amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute consists of the text of the "Microenterprise Results and Accountability Act of 2004".
amendment.purpose: Amendment in the nature of a substitute.

action.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Smith (NJ).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Smith (NJ) amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
